chat_history.message:
Hello,

The package of the order 40934349 could be not delivered because the letter box is not accessible.

Please ask your customer to reschedule the delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.

Valérie DECAMPS

Hello ecomobile,

DPD tracking does not work. How to show package tracking?

Thank you for your help.
Marijo Georgelluca from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The shipment could not be delivered as the mailbox is inaccessible, due to a coded door. Hence, kindly ask the customer to reschedule the delivery. Thank you.
The tracking link is: https://trace.dpd.fr/trace/10694000316505

Regards,
AS
